thread.title: Lake Zurich Rotary to host Halloween Bash fundraiser
thread.title_full: Lake Zurich Rotary to host Halloween Bash fundraiser

title: Lake Zurich Rotary to host Halloween Bash fundraiser
text: Daily Herald report On Saturday Oct. 24, the Lake Zurich Rotary Club invites the community to come to their 11th annual Halloween Bash to help fund college scholarships and end polio worldwide. Guests will enjoy Alex and the All-Stars, a popular local rock band, at a freaky Prom Night. Costumes are optional, but cash prizes will be given for the three best costumes. The party starts at 6 p.m. with dinner at the Columbus Centre (Knights of Columbus hall) 365 Surryse Ave, Lake Zurich. Dancing and cash bar will entertain until 11 p.m., along with raffles and valuable silent auction items from local businesses. Tickets are $35 per person ($65 per couple) and may be purchased from Lake Zurich Rotary members or online at https://lzrotaryhalloweenbash2015.eventbrite.com . Corporate sponsorships are still available. Go to www.Lakezurichrotary.org for more information. The funds raised are used for college and vocational scholarships for Lake Zurich High School students. Donations will also be made to Rotary's End Polio Now campaign. Share this page
